headline: Globe Life and North Texas Food Bank Expand Partnership to Deliver Fresh Food Across the Region
summary: Globe Life Inc. (NYSE: GL), a holding company specializing in life and supplemental health insurance, today announced a three-year partnership with North Texas Food Bank (NTFB) to expand access to fresh, healthy food across North Texas. Globe Life provided $75,000 in funding to sponsor a Produce Pod, a mobile food pantry designed to deliver fresh fruits, vegetables, and nonperishable items to underserved communities throughout the region.
